subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There were 141 relievers who pitched a significant number of innings in 2007, and only one had a higher earned run average than Brian Stokes. He had a 7.07 E.R.A. in Tampa Bay’s bullpen, which compiled the worst season by a relief corps in history.
